name: Sincerely Yours
description:
Sincerely Yours is a story about how two people, Hanano Yumeha and Terasaka Daiki learnt how to depend on each other after they both shared a short moment in their long life. A moment they both treasured, a moment worth a lifetime.

The game was created using TyranoBuilder for the TyranoBuilder Summer Jam 2015 in hope to learn and take our first steps in making our very own game.

The Team:

Shuya Fay - Responsible for most of the work, including public relations and putting the game together. Did all the hard work.

Candies Silver - Scenario dude. Didn't do all the hard work.

Credits

BGM: www.murasato.catfood.jp

BG: https://studiomugenjohncel.wordpress.com

http://loo.sakura.ne.jp/sozai_m.html http://www7b.biglobe.ne.jp/~osumashi/free_bg.html

Owners of each respective assets have given their consent for the use of their resources in the creation of the visual novel. Please support them if you like their work.

P/s: Feedbacks are welcomed. Thanks for playing!
